title: NovaDigm Therapeutics Raises $14M Series B to Support Phase 2 Trial of NDV-3 Vaccine Against Candida NovaDigm Therapeutics
author: Emily Mullin
description: NovaDigm Therapeutics a company developing innovative vaccines for fungal and bacterial infections today announced that it has closed a $14M Series B financing.
